backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, active users, media storage, and role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report placeholder with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up root div and loading main.tsx with cache-busting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app router defining lobby, chatroom, and admin routes with header/footer visibility logic and a 404 fallback.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Avatar picker dialog supporting uploads, GIF search via Giphy, avatar removal, and local avatar updates.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat area handling message list, auto-scroll, replies, pinned video, and send-message interactions.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom card with media thumbnails, Twitch and Twitter preview fetching, and basic metadata display.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, category, media upload, and YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URL validation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying a copyright message and link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar picker integration.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op placeholder component that intentionally renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays individual messages with reactions, video embeds, Twitter embeds, and pin/reply interactions.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Handles composing messages with text, media uploads, YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Shows a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file with no content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio player with waveform visualization, playback controls, and synchronization across multiple audio elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a debounced value that updates after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Ensures chatroom data is freshly refetched when the actor becomes ready by purging stale cache entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating chatrooms, messages, and user data with actor integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus theme variables and custom styling including voice message slider appearance.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Defines frontend configuration constants like the GIPHY API key and result limits.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a compact number formatter converting large numbers into k/M/B notation.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from Giphy, mapping API responses into a simplified GIF structure.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client‑side image compression with resizing, quality control, and progress callbacks.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON, extracts safe preview fields, caches results, and deduplicates concurrent requests.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching of Twitter preview data with validation, versioning, and expiration.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Contains URL parsers and thumbnail generators for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter content.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page allowing password‑protected chatroom deletion with filtering and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, increments its view count once, handles loading and error states, and renders the ChatArea component when data is available.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays the lobby with chatroom search, category filtering, creation dialog, and navigation to individual rooms using client-side filtered chatroom data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, backend payload-limit issues, anonymization plans, and pending backend fix requests related to getChatrooms.
